name: The Stupid And Dumb Adventure To Do Something 2
name_original: The Stupid And Dumb Adventure To Do Something 2
description:
!!!This game requires you to install the RPG Maker VX Ace RTP to play the game! You can install it by clicking here!

Welcome to the long awaited sequel to the stupid and dumb adventure to do something! This game takes place right after the events of the first one. Modern Kiryu has been killed by plastic, and needs to survive as a ghost, but to do so, he must be aided by the likes of Joe mama, Papyrus, Gru, and Dio Brando!

Will you revive Modern Kiryu, to become an all powerful god to continue his evil plans?

THIS GAME HAS:

Richards' that love the Greek alphabet!

A shit ton of forest!

Enragement Luigi!

Enragement modern Kiryu!

Joe mama!

Achievements!

Lot's of banger music!

Secret bosses!

A fuckton of references to other games!

And much, much more!
